Reviews.Title: Good smartphone
Reviews.Author: Anyel
Reviews.Content: is small, stable, comfortable and powerful;not so much as a s3 or more but enough and according to the cost

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Raul J. Centeno V
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT PRODUCT COMES A TIME IN EXCELLENT CONDITION VERY RESPONSIBLE SUPPLIER, WE RECOMMEND 100% WHAT YOU FOR YOUR KINDNESS CERTIFY

Reviews.Title: Great Phone !
Reviews.Author: ricky ramnanan
Reviews.Content: This phone works well for the price. Only problem when you go to voice search it very rear goes to what you command it to.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: jcp26
Reviews.Content: Perfect phone for someone who wants to be introduced into the samsung galaxy products. It was what i expected for a new user.

Reviews.Title: Error in his office
Reviews.Author: carlos daruiz
Reviews.Content: I delivered a product that has nothing to do with what you request, they asked for a S6310L and they sent a S6310T, now do not know what to do with, they have to give me a solution to correct this error in the delivery ...

Reviews.Title: Do not be fooled by the Galaxy branding
Reviews.Author: Dusty Bill "Bill"
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung Galaxy S3 but I needed an unlocked phone for work. I bought this as a cheap and cheerful second phone. However, it has turned out to be the worst cell phone that I ever purchased, going all the way back to the mid 1980's. The ear speaker is tinny and it is hard to hear what people are saying, the software is very slow and it has a habit of doing nothing and then doing a lot very quickly. The keypad was poor, but I use the swiftkey app to try deal with that. All in all, I think Samsung has made a big mistake going this poor specimen of a phone the 'Galaxy' branding. It will devalue the brand and nobody is going to trade up to another Samsung Galaxy phone, if this is their first Samsung phone. All good news for Apple then.

Reviews.Title: What a joke
Reviews.Author: Brian A Carey
Reviews.Content: This phone  is  really full of crap do not waste your money on this piece of garbage. so very sad
